title: Game is getting harder to play...
body:
The more I play this game the harder it gets but not for the reason you think, Its because I can't go one game without getting abuse by someone. Its getting to the point were I regret even playing this game, I enjoy the gameplay but I hate getting abused just for playing it, You can't even play bots without someone abusing someone, How is this game meant to be enjoyable or get more people to play if you can't even play bots without abuse?

TD;LR, The game is becoming more and more toxic everyday.
